sentences.en: A for a person, for example, typically pulls out useful listings from Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn.
sentences.cn: 比如, 当搜索某个人时, 结果中通常会列出来自Facebook 、 Twitter和LinkedIn的有用信息.

sentences.en: Birds had begun to chirp and twitter among the trees.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿开始在树丛中啁啾鸣啭.

sentences.en: Does it matter that a satirist tells his 80,000 Twitter followers that he thinks Starbucks stinks?
sentences.cn: 一位讽刺作家对他的8万名Twitter关注者说星巴克有异味,可是这件事重要 吗 ?

sentences.en: Everyone was in a twitter over the wedding.
sentences.cn: 为了筹备婚礼大家都忙得团团转.

sentences.en: He joined Twitter and other business networking sites.
sentences.cn: 他加入了Twitter和其他一些商业社交网络站点.

sentences.en: Her friend, who was riding with her, wrote about the incident on Twitter.
sentences.cn: 和她一起骑车的朋友随即就把这件事写到了微博网站Twitter上.

sentences.en: In his writing online, especially on Twitter, Assange is quick to lash out at perceived enemies.
sentences.cn: 在他的网上作品里, 特别在Twitter上, 阿桑格对于他所认定的敌人毫不留情.

sentences.en: It might sound a bit corny but my other mentor is Evan Williams, my Twitter - founder.
sentences.cn: 尽管这听起来有些老套,但我还是得说, 我的另一位导师是与我联手创办Twitter的埃文?威廉姆斯.

sentences.en: It might sound a bit corny but my other mentor is Evan Williams, my Twitter co - founder.
sentences.cn: 或许听上去有点老套,但我还是得说,我的另一位导师是埃文?威廉姆斯(EvanWilliams)——与我联手创办Twitter的人.

sentences.en: Mobile is really exciting as our goal is to make Twitter essential to everyone's lives.
sentences.cn: 手机在其中的作用确实让人激动,因为我们的目标是使Twitter成为 人们的生活中不可或缺的部分.

sentences.en: Naomi would waken to the twitter of birds.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米会被鸟儿吱吱喳喳的叫声唤醒。

sentences.en: Over on Twitter, things aren't much better.
sentences.cn: 就是在Twitter上, 情况也好不到哪儿去.

sentences.en: We were all of a twitter on the wedding day.
sentences.cn: 举行婚礼的那一天,我们都兴奋极了.

sentences.en: When Google's real - time search launched earlier this month, its results were primarily filled with Twitter updates.
sentences.cn: 本月早些时候谷歌推出即时信息搜索时, 搜索结果基本上都是Twitter上的发言.

sentences.en: With little fanfare , Bill Gates joined the ranks of celebrities on Twitter this week.
sentences.cn: 比尔?盖茨本周也悄然加入了使用Twitter的名人行列.

words.tran_cn: 易兴奋的；爱咯咯地笑的；颤抖的

trans.tran_cn: （鸟）叽叽喳喳的叫声，格格的笑声，一个网站名称
（人因兴奋）嘁嘁喳喳地讲，（鸟）叽叽喳喳地叫，格格地笑，（激动得）抖颤
（鸟等）吱吱叫，唧唧喳喳地讲述，颤动，抖动
